title: Eastlink Selects ARRIS ServAssure™ Alarm Central SaaS to Proactively Improve Subscriber Experience
text:
ARRIS Group , Inc . (NASDAQ: ARRS) today announced that Eastlink selected ARRIS ServAssure™ Alarm Central Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) to automate its process for identifying, prioritizing, and resolving potential service impairments—improving its broadband subscriber experience. 
Alarm Central will provide Eastlink with end-to-end visibility into the service delivery chain, across the HFC network to improve the customer experience. Eastlink can then address network and customer service issues proactively—resolving potential problems before they occur and reducing mean-time-to-repair (MTTR) or the average time required to repair a compromised component. As a result, Eastlink subscribers will enjoy fewer visible service interruptions and quicker issue resolution. 
'ARRIS ServAssure Alarm Central will enable Eastlink to take a more proactive approach to detecting plant issues and to resolving network issues quickly,' said Jim Fitzgerald , Senior Vice President, Engineering and CTO at Eastlink. 'We're working with ARRIS to ensure that our customers continue to experience the great service they have come to expect from us.' 
'Our ServAssure platform combines proven software and analytics with our expertise in video and broadband delivery to help leading service providers predict and prevent service interruptions,' said Bryant Isaacs , GM, Assurance Solutions at ARRIS. 'We look forward to working with Eastlink to continue improving the quality of experience for its subscribers all across Canada
